summary: Federal Prison Industries, a wholly government-owned corporation employing federal prison inmates, produces products and services that it sells to federal agencies. The Department of Defense was FPI's largest federal customer for fiscal year 2022 and purchased a range of items, including furniture, apparel, and electronics. DOD awarded contracts for about $163 million annually toward FPI products and services from fiscal years 2018-2022. When deciding whether...
title: Defense Contracting: DOD’s Use of Federal Prison Industries
